虚拟现实与阿片类药物：烧伤创面护理期间非药物疼痛管理的临床试验研究人员评估了虚拟现实作为一种非药物干预措施的可行性和有效性，与标准的基于阿片类药物的方法相比，用于管理成人烧伤患者在换药期间的程序性疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Virtual-reality-vs-opioids-clinical-trial-of-non-pharmacological-pain-management-during-burn-wound-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Virtual-reality-vs-opioids-clinical-trial-of-non-pharmacological-pain-management-during-burn-wound-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd9c6693-d72b-4dd9-aa8e-e7927cc08205 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 09:31:00 -0400 Virtual reality vs. opioids: clinical trial of non-pharmacological pain management during burn wound care
脂肪肝易感性：研究确定女性雌激素受体与遗传变异之间的相互作用研究人员寻求证据，证明含有 3 p.I148M 变体的 patatin 样磷脂酶结构域与女性之间在遗传和分子水平上的相互作用是否可以解释为什么绝经前女性仍然可以免受脂肪肝疾病的影响，而某些女性会出现快速进展的疾病。围绝经期和绝经后妇女。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Fatty-liver-disease-susceptibility-study-identizes-interaction- Between-estrogen-receptor-and-genic-variant-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Fatty-liver-disease-susceptibility-study-identizes-interaction- Between-estrogen-receptor-and-genic-variant-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d40fd3f-c09f-4a5e-8f47-6a71689a4336 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 09:05:00 -0400 Fatty liver disease susceptibility: study identifies interaction between estrogen receptor and genetic variant in women
美国医护人员比非医护人员面临更高的自杀风险六名医护人员 (HCW) 自杀死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/US-health-care-workers-are-at-greater-risk-of-suicide-than-none28093health-care-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/US-health-care-workers-are-at-greater-risk-of-suicide-than-none28093health-care-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad3d03ff-48bb-432a-8161-f27fe5fc0f35 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 08:46:00 -0400 US health care workers are at greater risk of suicide than non–health care workers
从游乐场到心灵的平静：幼儿活动对中期儿童心理健康的影响在最近的一篇文章中，研究人员评估了幼儿时期缺乏身体活动是否会影响中年儿童的心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/From-playgrounds-to-peace-of-mind-early-childhood-activitys-influence-on-middle-childhood-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/From-playgrounds-to-peace-of-mind-early-childhood-activitys-influence-on-middle-childhood-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53e845fe-f45d-4525-9285-c349818266e3 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 08:25:00 -0400 From playgrounds to peace of mind: early childhood activity's influence on middle childhood mental health

新的 Medicare Advantage 计划为亚裔美国人、拉丁裔和 LGBTQ+ 量身定制服务随着 Medicare Advantage 继续受到老年人的欢迎，南加州的三家公司正在开创针对文化和种族社区的新型计划，提供特殊服务和母语从业者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-Medicare-Advantage-plans-tailor-offerings-to-Asian-Americans-Latinos-and-LGBTQ2b.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-Medicare-Advantage-plans-tailor-offerings-to-Asian-Americans-Latinos-and-LGBTQ2b.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d413b4a6-65ef-4e8c-8d52-b2083b707279 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 06:40:48 -0400 New Medicare Advantage plans tailor offerings to Asian Americans, Latinos, and LGBTQ+
谁来监管医院跨市场合并？各国给出不同答案圣路易斯最大的医疗系统 BJC HealthCare 计划与堪萨斯城第二大的圣卢克医疗系统合并，到今年年底将密苏里州两岸超过 28 家医院合并在一起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Who-polices-hospitals-merging-across-markets-States-give- Different-answers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Who-polices-hospitals-merging-across-markets-States-give- Different-answers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80680e44-3401-4f31-baaa-00190ef56a74 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 06:37:03 -0400 Who polices hospitals merging across markets? States give different answers
新的多多基因评分提高了冠心病预测的准确性用于预测冠心病 (CHD) 的两个多多基因评分 (muti-PG)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-multi-polygenic-scores-boost-coronary-heart-disease-prediction-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-multi-polygenic-scores-boost-coronary-heart-disease-prediction-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=061ff1fb-191b-40f9-9a0c-d4011e51ce92 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 06:37:00 -0400 New multi-polygenic scores boost coronary heart disease prediction accuracy
人工智能在检测肺部问题方面能否超越放射科医生？新研究的影响放射学的新研究评估了四种人工智能工具在检测胸部X光片上常见急性症状时的诊断准确性。虽然人工智能工具显示出中等到高的敏感性和很强的阴性预测值，但与传统放射学报告相比，它们的假阳性率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Can-AI-outperform-radiists-in-detecting-lung-issues-New-study-weighs-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Can-AI-outperform-radiists-in-detecting-lung-issues-New-study-weighs-in.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3195b0b6-3dfa-4f81-a248-31744100eecb Thu, 28 Sep 2023 00:48:00 -0400 Can AI outperform radiologists in detecting lung issues? New study weighs in
